alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Claiborne; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 2:49AM CDT until April 13 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southwestern Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... North central Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 249 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dubberly, or 8 miles south of Minden, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Minden, Sibley, Gibsland, Dubberly, Heflin, Athens, Mount Lebanon, Holly Springs, Ogden and Ada. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
